name: To the Core (itch) (Shide)
description:
Dig deeper until you run out of fuel.

Upgrade your drill.

Repeat.

The game was made in 48 hours during Ludum Dare 48 game jam.

LD entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/$246148

If you have any ideas or suggestions regarding gameplay - let me know in the comments.
